unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**

unnormalised: Hey fam! Wondering if your Insta game is truly reaching the right audience, especially during the festive season? Think Onam celebrations and biryani-loving foodies? Then you NEED to check out the latest updates in follower analytics!
normalised: Hey fam! Wondering if your Insta game is truly reaching the right audience, especially during the festive season? Think Onam celebrations and biryani-loving foodies? Then you N E E D to check out the latest updates in follower analytics!

unnormalised: Forget just basic demographics. We're talking granular data, folks. New tools are popping up that let you segment your followers based on their purchase history (ever bought a sari from a local shop?), their interest in Bollywood movies (huge for collaborations, right?), and even their preferred biryani spice level!
normalised: Forget just basic demographics. We're talking granular data, folks. New tools are popping up that let you segment your followers based on their purchase history (ever bought a sari from a local shop?), their interest in Bollywood movies (huge for collaborations, right?), and even their preferred biryani spice level!

unnormalised: Chennai-based startup, "SocialSpice," is leading the charge. They're offering advanced analytics that integrate with platforms like Instagram and Facebook, giving you a clear picture of your audience. Imagine knowing that 60% of your followers in Kerala are likely to engage with content featuring traditional Onam pookalams.

unnormalised: Early adopters are seeing engagement boosts of up to 30%! This is a game changer for brands trying to connect with the Indian audience beyond just superficial likes. Get ready to ditch the generic and embrace the desi detail! Time to analyze, strategize and watch those follower numbers (and sales, of course!) rise higher than the Qutub Minar!
